title: FOX
description:
FOX App has everything you love from FOX and FOX Premium: Best TV Shows, Movies, Live Sports, Documentaries and much more. If you already have channels from FOX on your TV you can also enjoy it on your tablet or smartphone by downloading this App.
How does it work?
Download the App, create your account, link with your TV Provider and watch the best content from FOX: The best movies, entire seasons from the best shows, Exclusive live events and the best content for your kids.
Terms and conditions: https://about.foxplay.com/legal/en/terms.html
Privacy Policy: https://about.foxplay.com/legal/en/privacy.html
You can also verify your TV subscription and enjoy all the content from FOX, FOX Premium, FX, FOX Life, National Geographic, NatGeo Kids, Baby TV and FXM depending on the channels you have in your TV subscription.
Requirements: 3Mbps broadband for a great experience. We recommend you to use wi-fi connection.
If you need help contact us on help.foxplay.com
